      public Game(int numberPlayers) throws it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.exceptions.NumberPlayerWrongException
      This constructor creates a new Game
      Parameters:
      numberPlayers - the number of players that will play the game
      Throws:
      it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.exceptions.NumberPlayerWrongException - if the number of players is not between 2 and 4

    • addToGame

      public void addToGame(String nickname) throws it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.exceptions.GameFullException, it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.exceptions.NicknameAlreadyInUseException, it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.exceptions.NicknameInvalidException
      This method adds the new Player to the game calling the private method setPlayer It checks if the game is full It checks if the nickname could be used It also gives the player his starting card

    • getPickableCards

      public List<it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.cards.types.PlayableCard> getPickableCards()
      This method returns the list of the visible cards and the top cards of resource and gold deck. If a deck is finished, it returns the top card of the other deck. If the two decks are finished, it returns only the pickable cards (pickableResourceCards, pickableGoldCards).
      Specified by:
      getPickableCards in interface it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.GameInterface
      Returns:
      the list of possible cards that the player can choose

    • initializeDecks

      public void initializeDecks()
      This method initializes the decks of the game. It reads the json files and creates the cards. It shuffles the decks. It uses GsonBuilder with registerTypeAdapter. It uses the classes in the gson package.
